title: AMC’s New Year’s Resolution: Refinance High-Interest Debt
sub_head: CEO Adam Aron says the movie-theater chain will aim to shore up its balance sheet
body:
AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. CEO Adam Aron said Monday that he wants to refinance some of the company’s expensive debt to reduce its interest exposure, push out some debt maturities by several years and loosen covenants.
“In 2020 and early 2021, AMC took on debt at high interest rates to survive,” Mr. Aron said on his Twitter account, which was disclosed by the company in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.
